description: Min[x] composite zero site for Sigma[x+6^n]-Sigma[x]-6^n.
mathematica: L = {}; Do[i = 1; While[ ! ((Plus @@ Divisors[i + 6^j] == 6^j + Plus @@ Divisors[i]) && ! PrimeQ[i]), i++ ]; L = Append[L, i], {j, 1, 11}]; L (from Vit Planocka)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 01 2000
extensions: One more term from Vit Planocka (planocka(AT)mistral.cz), Sep 23 2003
